column5: My place is a very comfy bedroom that can easily fit 2 people. Easy access to SRT tollway that takes you to DFW Airport - about 20mins away. Nebraska Furniture Mart is also within 5mins walking distance. My house is in The Cascade subdivision which has lots of great amenities around including a pool in the community (2mins walk) and good restaurants within 5mins walking distance. You'll have access to common areas such as kitchen & living room as well as office space to work & Wifi in my house.
column8: Super comfy room in a nice environment
